text:
LAST NIGHT: @NXP lost case on tech that wirelessly connects products to internet, as Seattle federal jury found @Impinj’s RFID tag chips & readers don’t infringe $NXPI patent.

Not a total loss. Jurors upheld patent's validity, easing burden of any appeal.
